text: The 2001 FIBA Under-19 World Championship for Women took place in the Czech Republic from 14 to 22 July 2001. It was co-organised by the International Basketball Federation (FIBA) and Czech Basketball Federation. Twelve national teams competed for the championship. Czech Republic came away with the Gold medal by defeating Russia 82–80 in the final.FIBA Archive. 2001 World Championship for Junior Women. Event Standings.
